verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%> and Silvanus <S%G4610><s%> and Timothy <S%G5095><s%> to the church <S%G1577><s%> of the Thessalonians <S%G2331><s%> in God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> and the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you and peace. <S%G1515><s%>
We give <S%G2168><s%> thanks <S%G2168><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> of you, making <S%G4160><s%> mention <S%G3417><s%> [of you] in our prayers; <S%G4335><s%>

constantly <S%G89><s%> bearing <S%G3421><s%> in mind <S%G3421><s%> your work <S%G2041><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> and labor <S%G2873><s%> of love <S%G26><s%> and steadfastness <S%G5281><s%> of hope <S%G1680><s%> in our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> in the presence <S%G1715><s%> of our God <S%G2316><s%> and Father, <S%G3962><s%>
knowing, <S%G3609><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> beloved <S%G25><s%> by God, <S%G2316><s%> [His] choice <S%G1589><s%> of you;

for our gospel <S%G2098><s%> did not come <S%G1096><s%> to you in word <S%G3056><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> but also <S%G2532><s%> in power <S%G1411><s%> and in the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> and with full <S%G4183><s%> conviction; <S%G4136><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as you know <S%G3609><s%> what <S%G3634><s%> kind <S%G3634><s%> of men <S%G3634><s%> we proved <S%G1096><s%> to be among <S%G1722><s%> you for your sake. <S%G1223><s%>

You also <S%G2532><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> imitators <S%G3402><s%> of us and of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> having received <S%G1209><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> in much <S%G4183><s%> tribulation <S%G2347><s%> with the joy <S%G5479><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%>
so <S%G5620><s%> that you became <S%G1096><s%> an example <S%G5179><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the believers <S%G4100><s%> in Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> and in Achaia. <S%G882><s%>

For the word <S%G3056><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> has sounded <S%G1837><s%> forth <S%G1837><s%> from you, not only <S%G3440><s%> in Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> and Achaia, <S%G882><s%> but also in every <S%G3956><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> your faith <S%G4102><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has gone <S%G1831><s%> forth, <S%G1831><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that we have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> to say <S%G2980><s%> anything. <S%G5100><s%>

For they themselves <S%G846><s%> report <S%G518><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> us what <S%G3697><s%> kind <S%G3697><s%> of a reception <S%G1529><s%> we had <S%G2192><s%> with you, and how <S%G4459><s%> you turned <S%G1994><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> from idols <S%G1497><s%> to serve <S%G1398><s%> a living <S%G2198><s%> and true <S%G228><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

and to wait <S%G362><s%> for His Son <S%G5207><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> He raised <S%G1453><s%> from the dead, <S%G3498><s%> [that is] Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> who delivers <S%G4506><s%> us from the wrath <S%G3709><s%> to come. <S%G2064><s%>
